name: parse-transit-data
description: AWS Lambda handlers for Winnipeg Translit (Live)

scripts.compress: cd package; zip -r ../parseTransitData.zip .; cd ../; zip parseTransitData.zip app.py
scripts.deploy:create: aws lambda create-function --function-name parseTransitData --runtime 'python3.9' --role LAMBDA_ROLE --zip-file 'fileb://index.zip' --handler index.handler
scripts.update: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run compress && npm run deploy:update
